## ReportingExceptionHandlerOptions.(constructor)

Creates instance of ReportingExceptionHandlerOptions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(debugMode?: boolean, showAlsoAlert?: boolean, captureScreenImage?: boolean, captureScreenHtml?: boolean, captureHtmlInputs?: boolean, enableServerLogging?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  debugMode | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether should logger log errors also in browser console |
|  showAlsoAlert | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that also alert should show error message |
|  captureScreenImage | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that screenshot should be taken when error occurs |
|  captureScreenHtml | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that current html snapshot should be captured |
|  captureHtmlInputs | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that current html inputs state should be transformed into html |
|  enableServerLogging | <code>boolean</code> |  |
